## App.navLinkStatus property

The initial status of the application's navLink. Defaulting to `visible` if `status` is `accessible` and `hidden` if status is `inaccessible` See [AppNavLinkStatus](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.appnavlinkstatus.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
navLinkStatus?: AppNavLinkStatus;
```
